net.antidot.api.search
Class DefaultFilterCoder

java.lang.Object
  net.antidot.api.search.CoderBase
      net.antidot.api.search.DefaultFilterCoder
All Implemented Interfaces:
FilterCoderInterface
public class DefaultFilterCoder
extends CoderBase
implements FilterCoderInterface

Default implementation for filter coder.

This implementation is really simple and can be lightly customized through constructor parameters.

It should be necessary to adapt, modify or implement a new filter coder depending on your needs.
